item.title: Build a Simple WhatsApp bot in Python using Selenium
item.description: Selenium is a web automation package available for all popular languages. To know more about selenium you can refer to official Selenium docs. Here, we will be making a simple WhatsApp bot using Python and Selenium which will reply the current time for every message. Installing Selenium So, first of all, we need to install Selenium for Python by running following command in terminal. pip install selenium Selenium also requires a driver to interface with the chosen browser.
